extendedInfo.description: The pace of life and change can be overwhelming.We all need to slow down sometimes, to relax, to unwind - yet after a hectic day at work or a terrible commute it may seem impossible.  Play this deep relaxation audio program and feel the world slow down.For more info visit www.AndrewJohnson.co.uk

reviews.title: Great way to unwind
reviews.comment: Had hypnotherapy before and this app remindes how great it is plus all the benefits of meditation... Thank you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: awesome
reviews.comment: great app  makes me feel extremely relaxed and refreshed  each time i listen.  highly recommend this app to everyone
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: I have used this app for a couple of years as a way of unwinding at night. It is perfect and never fails to send me into a deep sleep, feeling refreshed and calm the next day. Cannot praise this and Andrew Johnson enough, thank you.
reviews.author: Calvin Meek

reviews.title: One Word Amazing
reviews.comment: AWESOME Thank you Andrew God Bless you
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: This is the best... Use it at work on break to relax and at home to fall asleep at night
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It works
reviews.comment: This app profoundly helped me when I was very stressed.
reviews.author: Sandra Schneiderman Jones

reviews.title: The best relaxation app ever
reviews.comment: Highly recommended
reviews.author: Khalil Raad

reviews.comment: Love this app! I no longer have neck pain which is wherw i carried my stress
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Have almost all Andrew Johnson apps, listen to one every night to fall asleep. Highly recommended. No issues with droid x
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its simple and easy: a quick way to reset yourself so that you can enjoy yourself more.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I have 10 of these apps & luv them! Wish they had corresponding times so I can prog a 1 or 2 hr session for acupuncture or massage...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Amazing app I have serious trouble sleeping and this helps me so much! One of the best apps on the market!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fantasic as usual. I had this on my iphone for a year and when I got my droid x I had to get it. Love the scottish accent as it reminds me of home.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I have always had a hard time falling asleep, not anymore. Works great on my droid 2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Brilliant just brilliant :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works well, wish you had more options, and doesn\'t work on Incredible (no sdcard)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: this actually is wonderful. I sleep like a champ now
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Loved this.
reviews.comment: Simply relaxing
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I might need to give it a few more trys but it made me depressed and actually start to cry, I turned it off and just popped some percocet lol
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love it... works like a charm.
reviews.author: A Google User
